priorVersion.title: CDISC Clinical Classification APACHE II Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C120984

self.title: CDISC Clinical Classification APACHE II Test Name Terminology

definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II test name.
name: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Clinical Classification APACHE II Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification Test Name

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Glasgow coma score: Score equals 15 minus actual GCS.
terms.preferredTerm: APACHE II - 15 Minus Glasgow Coma Score

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - A: Total acute physiology score.
terms.preferredTerm: APACHE II - A, Total Acute Physiology Score

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Arterial pH (preferred).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - B: Age points (years).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - C: Chronic health points.
terms.preferredTerm: APACHE II - C, Chronic Health Points

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Heart rate (ventricular response).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Hematocrit (%).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Mean arterial pressure - mm Hg.
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Oxygenation (mm Hg): FIO2 greater than or equal to 0.5 record A-aDO2.
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Oxygenation (mm Hg): FIO2 less than 0.5 record only PaO2.
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Respiratory rate (non-ventilated or ventilated).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Serum creatinine (mg/100 mL) (double point score for acute renal failure).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Serum HCO3 (venous mMol/L) (Not preferred, use if no ABGs).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Serum potassium (mMol/L).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Serum sodium (mMol/L).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Temperature - rectal (degree C).
Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - Total APACHE II score.
terms.preferredTerm: APACHE II - Total APACHE II Score

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II - White blood count (total/mm3) (in 1,000s).
